name: Maze (itch) (Soglank9)
description: To play find a way out and escape the maze.  Touch the screen and slide to change direction and guide the dots through the correct maze.  Game page there is a page selection to select one of three game page modes according to your preference.  For classic mode with increasingly difficult mazes, dark mode where you only have a limited field of vision and a timed mode where you have to beat the maze as fast as possible.  Try not to get lost and complete all the levels
